HeroSection.title: Hassle-free Parking Reservations
HeroSection.subtitle: Secure your parking spot in advance. No more driving around looking for parking spaces.

AboutSection.title: About ParkEasy
AboutSection.description: We provide convenient and secure parking solutions for all types of vehicles. With our easy-to-use reservation system, you can book your parking spot in advance and avoid the hassle of finding parking when you arrive.
AboutSection.access247Desc: Our parking facility is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for your convenience.
AboutSection.allVehiclesDesc: We accommodate all types of vehicles, from compact cars to large SUVs and motorcycles.
AboutSection.securePaymentDesc: Pay securely online with Stripe or in person with cash upon arrival.

PricingSection.title: Pricing
PricingSection.description: Transparent pricing based on vehicle type and duration. No hidden fees.

ContactSection.title: Get in Touch
ContactSection.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Here's how you can reach us.
ContactSection.emailNote: We'll respond as soon as possible

Reservation.noSpotsAvailable: No spots available for this vehicle type.
Reservation.confirmReservationDescription: Please review your reservation details and confirm to proceed. This action will create your parking reservation.
Reservation.confirmationDetails: Your reservation has been confirmed. Details below:
Reservation.name: Name
Reservation.slotUnavailable: No availability for the selected time.
Reservation.availableSlotsHelp: You can reserve in these time slots.
Reservation.unavailableSlotsHelp: These time slots are not available for reservation.
Reservation.exitTimeError: The exit date must be later than the entry time.
Reservation.recheckAvailabilityRequired: You have modified the date, time, or vehicle type. Please check availability again to proceed.

submissionErrors.stripePaymentFailed: Unable to initiate Stripe payment. Please try again.
submissionErrors.reservationFailed: Failed to process reservation. Please check your information and try again.
submissionErrors.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.

Reservation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
Reservation.invalidFirstName: First name should only contain letters.
Reservation.invalidLastName: Last name should only contain letters.
Reservation.invalidPhone: Phone number should only contain numbers and at least 7 digits.
Reservation.paymentCancelledMessage: You cancelled the payment process. You can return to complete your reservation.
Reservation.modifyDataMessage: If you need to modify your reservation details (dates, vehicle type, etc.), you'll need to create a new reservation.

ManageReservation.title: Manage Reservation
ManageReservation.subtitle: Find, modify, or cancel your reservation.
ManageReservation.lookupLabel: Enter your reservation code and email to manage your booking.
ManageReservation.notFound: No reservation found with the provided code and email.
ManageReservation.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation? This action cannot be undone.
ManageReservation.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

Prices.title: Manage Prices
Prices.description: Update parking prices by vehicle type and duration.

History.title: Reservation & Action History
History.description: View all reservations and admin actions.

spaces.title: Spaces
spaces.description: Manage parking spaces by vehicle type.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Filter reservations by date range, vehicle type, and status.

editDialog.title: Edit Reservation
editDialog.description: Update the entry and exit dates for this reservation.

cancelDialog.title: Cancel Reservation
cancelDialog.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation? This action cannot be undone.
